item.title: The Small Decision That Made Our Product Feel More Human
item.description: Sometimes the smallest design choices create the biggest difference in how a product feels.

item.title: What I Learned Hosting My First Vibecoding Session
item.description: Live coding with an audience taught me more about developer experience than months of user research.
